nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_884
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: I went to the library and read whatever I could find about the causes of the mysterious disappearances of the ships and planes in the Bermuda Triangle.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_885
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Continue treating friends like this, and you will lose them all.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_886
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: They must know their product thoroughly and know how to promote sales by word of mouth, telephone or letter.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_887
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: It suddenly dawned on me that money couldn't make up for all that he had suffered in the past five years.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_888
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Some people refer to translation as science while others take it as art.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_889
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Instead of imposing personal views upon others, we should promote democracy.
